definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: As a result, a fuel-saving potential of up to eight per cent is possible.
sentences.chinese: 因此，节油潜力高达百分之八，是可能的。

sentences.english: The technology of one step synthesis of terpinyl acetate from turpentine and glacial acetic acid is described.
sentences.chinese: 论述了松节油与冰乙酸一步法合成乙酸松油酯工艺。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses an oxyhydrogen catalysis combustion-supporting environmental-protection fuel economizer of a motor vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 一种机动车氢氧催化助燃环保节油器。

sentences.english: This article reviews the utilization of turpentine.
sentences.chinese: 这是一篇有关松节油利用的综述。

sentences.english: Automobile oil-saving, non-energy, self-feeding generator set.
sentences.chinese: 汽车节油，无能源，自给式，发电机组。

sentences.english: The turpentine has strong odours; the dried turnips will be tainted.
sentences.chinese: 松节油有强烈的气味，萝卜干会被污染。
许多油漆可用松节油稀释。

sentences.english: Small, fuel-efficient, front-wheel-drive cars were the wave of the future.
sentences.chinese: 小型的，节油的，前轮驱动的汽车是今后的趋向。

sentences.english: The motor hummed pleasantly as the plane reached cruising speed.
sentences.chinese: 飞机达到最大节油速度时，马达发出的嗡嗡声很好听。

definition: Mazda, Japanese car make (derived from name Matsuda 松田)/also known as 萬事得|万事得
discharge volume/engine capacity/engine displacement (volume of air fuel mixture drawn in during one cycle)
